# File rubilicious.rb, line 176
      def inbox(date = nil)
        time_prefix = "#{date || Time.now.strftime('%Y-%m-%d')}T"
        ret = get('inbox/get?' << (date ? "dt=#{date}" : ''), 'post').map do |post|
          post['time'] = Time.iso8601("#{time_prefix}#{post['time']}Z")
          post
        end
        ret
      end
